TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HyperLinkDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，為 Web 伺服器控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the Web server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項建立用戶端瀏覽器瀏覽至另一個網頁的連結。The control creates a link for the client browser to navigate to another Web page. 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換到設計檢視中，標記原始程式碼描述控制會剖析並在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視中時，設計階段控制項就會保存標記原始程式碼，並編輯成 Web 網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page. 類別提供設計階段支援控制項。The class provides design-time support for the control. 方法會傳回用來呈現關聯的標記控制項在設計階段。The method returns the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time. 至相關聯的控制項變更時，呼叫方法。The method is called when there is a change to the associated control. ## Examples 本節包含兩個程式碼範例。This section contains two code examples. 第一個示範如何自類別，覆寫方法，並提供屬性的值。The first one demonstrates how to derive a class from the class, override a method, and supply a property value. 第二個示範如何衍生的控制項控制項，並將屬性套用在衍生的控制項。The second one demonstrates how to derive a control from the control and apply an attribute on the derived control. 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生`CustomHyperLinkDesigner`類別從類別。The following code example shows how to derive a `CustomHyperLinkDesigner` class from the class. 它會覆寫方法來提供預設值為屬性，如果原始值為空字串 ("")。It overrides the method to supply a default value for the property if the original value for the is an empty string (""). 這可確保相關聯的控制項將會顯示在設計階段。This ensures that the associated control will be visible at design time. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLinkDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlinkdesigner.vb#1)] 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生`CustomHyperLink`控制項從控制項，並套用屬性`CustomHyperLink`控制項使其與`CustomHyperLinkDesigner`。The following code example shows how to derive the `CustomHyperLink` control from the control and apply a attribute on the `CustomHyperLink` control to associate it with the `CustomHyperLinkDesigner`. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLink.cs#3)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlink.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立的新執行個體類別時，它會建立相關聯控制項或一份設計介面上的控制項。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the class when it creates the associated control or a copy of the control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 取得在設計階段用來呈現關聯控制項的標記。

span.span: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.

returns.span: 字串，包含在設計階段用來呈現關聯超連結控制項的標記。

span.span: A string containing the markup used to render the associated hyperlink control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會產生相關聯的設計階段標記控制項。The method generates the design-time markup for the associated control. 方法會先將儲存的本機複本， ，和屬性，並將子集合。The method first saves local copies of the , , and properties, as well as the child collection. 它的原始值會提供預設值為這些屬性`null`或空白。It provides default values for these properties if the original values are `null` or blank. 方法接著呼叫基底方法，以產生標記，並將屬性和子控制項集合為其原始值，如有必要。The method then calls the base method to generate the markup and restores the properties and child control collection to their original values, if necessary. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何衍生`CustomHyperLinkDesigner`類別從類別。The following code example shows how to derive the `CustomHyperLinkDesigner` class from the class. 它會覆寫方法來提供預設值為屬性，如果原始值為空字串 ("")。It overrides the method to supply a default value for the property if the original value for is an empty string (""). 這可確保相關聯的控制項將會顯示在設計階段。This ensures that the associated control will be visible at design time. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/CS/CustomHyperLinkDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/HyperLinkDesigner_Resubmit/VB/customhyperlinkdesigner.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public override void OnComponentChanged (object sender, System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance void OnComponentChanged(object sender, class System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs ce) cil managed
Public Overrides Sub OnComponentChanged (sender As Object, ce As ComponentChangedEventArgs)
public: override void OnComponentChanged(System::Object ^ sender, System::ComponentModel::Design::ComponentChangedEventArgs ^ ce);

span.span: The object that is the source of the event.

param.name: ce
param.span: 包含事件資料的 物件。

span.span: A object that contains the event data.

summary.span: 在關聯的控制項有變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when there is a change to the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法時，會呼叫事件相關聯的控制項，就會引發。The method is called when the event of the associated control is raised. 一般而言，這是在回應上控制項的屬性變更 (例如，**屬性**方格變更)。Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change). 建立物件，然後呼叫基底方法。The creates a object, and then calls the base method.
